name: Project Knight
description:
This release is a prototype, meaning there is a lot more to be put in until the final version which is planned to release 2021. Although being a short prototype, it will not be lacking, showing the various main mechanics with the tutorial level, as well as a few of the enemies that will be thrown at you throughout the game. Project Knight will feature various little bugs and maybe even some glitches considering this is a one-man development team, but those will be fixed ASAP whenever they're known!

Feedback is well appreciated!

Current features

  • Single Player
  • Roguelike capabilities
  • Various enemies

Future Features

  • Addition of multiplayer (2-4)
  • Multiple game modes
  • Different terrains
  • A plethora of weapons
  • Outfit selection

Story

Trapped and wanting to find your way back to the throne, with a multitude of weapons at your disposal you'll have to fight your way through various terrains to then overthrow the wretched king and claim back what was once yours.

Project Knight is not the official name but named that until further notice.
